insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Indicates whether to skip TLS verification when cloning the repository. Default is false.

repoURL.description: The URL of a remote Git repository to clone. Required.

checkout.description: The commits, branches, or tags to check out from the repository and the paths where they should be checked out. At least one must be specified.

branch.description: The branch to checkout. Mutually exclusive with 'tag' and 'fromFreight=true'. If none of these is specified, the default branch is checked out.

fromFreight.description: Indicates whether the ID of a commit to check out may be obtained from Freight. A value of 'true' is mutually exclusive with 'branch' and 'tag'. If none of these is specified, the default branch is checked out.

path.description: The path where the repository should be checked out.

tag.description: The tag to checkout. Mutually exclusive with 'branch' and 'fromFreight=true'. If none of these is specified, the default branch is checked out.
